markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Contract](/Traits.aspx?ID=329)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Legends](/Sources.aspx?ID=40) pg. 10</row>

A contract is a type of item that magically establishes an agreement between multiple parties and typically grants magical benefits.
name: Contract
